source:
%%pyspark
## 1. Załaduj dane z Bronze i Customers jako tymczasowe widoki
df_bronze = spark.read.parquet("abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/MinIo_Distributors/**")
df_bronze.createOrReplaceTempView("bronze_inventory")

%%sql
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS silver;
-- 1. Załaduj dane z Bronze i Customers jako tymczasowe widoki
--CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_inventory
--USING parquet
--OPTIONS (
--  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/MinIo_Distributors/**'
--);

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW silver_d_customers
USING delta
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_customers'
);

-- 2. Utwórz tabelę docelową Silver jako Delta (jeśli nie istnieje)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS silver.f_wh_data (
  product_id STRING,
  country_id STRING,
  transaction_date DATE,
  whrs_sell_in_quantity DOUBLE,
  whrs_open_quantity DOUBLE,
  whrs_end_quantity DOUBLE,
  whrs_sell_in_amount DOUBLE,
  whrs_open_amount DOUBLE,
  whrs_end_amount DOUBLE,
  unit_price DOUBLE,
  whrs_update_date DATE
)
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_wh_data/';

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW aggregated_bronze_wh AS
    WITH join_wh AS (
        SELECT
            inv.*,
            c.country_id
        FROM bronze_inventory inv
        JOIN silver_d_customers c ON inv.customer_id = c.customer_id
    ),
    select_wh AS (
        SELECT
            product_id,
            country_id,
            update_date as whrs_update_date,
            TRUNC(transaction_date, 'MM') AS transaction_date,
            unit_price,
            whrs_sell_in_quantity,
            whrs_open_quantity,
            whrs_end_quantity
        FROM join_wh
    ),
    aggregated AS (
        SELECT
            product_id,
            country_id,
            transaction_date,
            max(whrs_update_date) as  whrs_update_date,
            SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity) AS whrs_sell_in_quantity,
            SUM(whrs_open_quantity) AS whrs_open_quantity,
            SUM(whrs_end_quantity) AS whrs_end_quantity,
            ROUND(SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS whrs_sell_in_amount,
            ROUND(SUM(whrs_open_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS whrs_open_amount,
            ROUND(SUM(whrs_end_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS whrs_end_amount,
            ROUND(SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity * unit_price) / NULLIF(SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity), 0), 2) AS unit_price
        FROM select_wh
        GROUP BY product_id, country_id, transaction_date
    )
 SELECT * FROM aggregated;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW filter_aggregated_bronze_wh AS
SELECT * from aggregated_bronze_wh  n 
where  NOT EXISTS (select product_id From silver.f_wh_data s 
                    where s.product_id =n.product_id 
                      and s.country_id = n.country_id
                      and s.transaction_date = n.transaction_date
                      and s.whrs_update_date = n.whrs_update_date);


-- 3. MERGE danych do tabeli Silver z agregacją i filtrowaniem
MERGE INTO silver.f_wh_data AS target
USING filter_aggregated_bronze_wh AS source
ON target.product_id = source.product_id
   AND target.country_id = source.country_id
   AND target.transaction_date = source.transaction_date
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    whrs_sell_in_quantity = source.whrs_sell_in_quantity,
    whrs_open_quantity = source.whrs_open_quantity,
    whrs_end_quantity = source.whrs_end_quantity,
    whrs_sell_in_amount = source.whrs_sell_in_amount,
    whrs_open_amount = source.whrs_open_amount,
    whrs_end_amount = source.whrs_end_amount,
    unit_price = source.unit_price,
    whrs_update_date = source.whrs_update_date
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    product_id, country_id, transaction_date,
    whrs_sell_in_quantity, whrs_open_quantity, whrs_end_quantity,
    whrs_sell_in_amount, whrs_open_amount, whrs_end_amount,
    unit_price, whrs_update_date
  )
  VALUES (
    source.product_id, source.country_id, source.transaction_date,
    source.whrs_sell_in_quantity, source.whrs_open_quantity, source.whrs_end_quantity,
    source.whrs_sell_in_amount, source.whrs_open_amount, source.whrs_end_amount,
    source.unit_price,source.whrs_update_date
  );
